references: J. H. Conway and R. K. Guy, The Book of Numbers, Copernicus Press, NY, 1996, p. 54.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: q=15;lst={};Do[AppendTo[lst,(n+1)^q-n^q],{n,0,4!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 23 2009 *)Table[(n+1)^15-n^15,{n,0,20}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 22 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
